an5.98:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu anapanassatim bahulikaronto nacirasseva akuppam pativijjhati.
an5.98:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appattho hoti appakicco subharo susantoso jivitaparikkharesu;
an5.98:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu anapanassatim bahulikaronto nacirasseva akuppam pativijjhati”ti.
